roleset.name: find, notice

role.descr: instrument(al process), if separate from arg0

example.name: all args
example.text: Recently, Gen-Probe received a broad U.S. patent for a technology that-1 [*trace*-1]-2 helps *trace*-2 detect, identify and quantify non-viral organisms through the targeting of a form of genetic material called ribosomal RNA.
example.arg: through the targeting of a form of genetic material

roleset.note: Member of VNcls see-30.1-1. Comparison with 'hear' and 'find'.

example.name: Bowser up to his old tricks (and maybe some new ones?)
example.text: Lights , action : I was asleep , but Luigi was awake , and he thought he detected a vague form nearing the bed .
example.arg: a vague figure nearing the bed

predicate.note: Frames file for 'detect' based on sentences in financial subcorpus
